titleStmt.title: An Electronic Edition Mishnah Berakhot, S08221

note.p: Mishnah text, extracted from the Ms. Paris Heb. 1389, Bibliothèqe Nationale as published in Schäfer, et al., Synopsis, Vol I/1-2.

Based on a transcription by Anja Engel, Kerstin Ipta, Uta Lohmann, Martina Urban und Gert Wildensee, last revision by Hans-Jürgen Becker. Responsibility by Peter Schäfer, Hans-Jürgen Becker. Converted to TEI by Gottfried Reeg using TUSCRIPT

revisionDesc.change: Sample transcription and markup of Bava Metsia Ch. 2
